long_description: With a high-quality lens optimized for overcast conditions, the Giro Amulet women's snow goggles also feature an ergonomic fit to keep you comfortably carving all season long,. Persimmon Blaze lens has a bronze tint with 50% visible light transmission and a Fiery Scarlet mirror finish to heighten detail and contrast in overcast, low-light conditions. Made by Carl Zeiss Vision, the spherical lens tapers from the optical center toward the periphery for a wide field of vision with minimal distortion and excellent clarity. Double-layer lens helps reduce fogging by creating a thermal barrier between the cold outside air and warm, moist air around your face. Anti-fog coating and lens vents also help prevent inner lens from fogging up and obstructing your view. 3-layer face foam is designed to ensure a tight seal, good moisture management and maximum comfort. Frame is engineered to offer an optimal, ergonomic fit around facial anatomy, resulting in excellent comfort and helmet compatibility. The women's Giro Amulet snow goggles are designed to fit medium-size adult faces.
